newsitem.title: USA: ShowBiz Pizza files for share offering.
newsitem.headline: ShowBiz Pizza files for share offering.

text.p: ShowBiz Pizza Time Inc said it has filed a registration statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission covering a proposed public offering of 3.2 million shares of common stock.
The company said all of these shares will be sold by Hallwood Group Inc and certain of its affiliates.
Hallwood has also granted the underwriters an option to purchase an additional 454,746 shares of common stock owned by Hallwood to cover over-allotments if any.

Credit Suisse First Boston and Principal Financial Securities will be managers for the proposed offering. ShowBiz Pizza will not receive any proceeds from the proposed sale of shares by the selling stockholders.
